meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4020.

td.p: Dan Royles, a senior from Chula Vista, California
Margaret Monroe, a junior from South Plainfield, New Jersey
Lindsey Bartlett, a junior from Winter Haven, Florida

tr.td: U.S. CITIES
IT'S A FACT
LITERARY TITLE PAIRS
GOING TO THE DOGS
